targets.expr:
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}", route="/logproto.Pusher/Push"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write", route="/logproto.Pusher/Push"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-read", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-read"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}", route=~"/logproto.Querier/Query|/logproto.Querier/Label|/logproto.Querier/Series|/logproto.Querier/QuerySample|/logproto.Querier/GetChunkIDs"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write", route=~"/logproto.Querier/Query|/logproto.Querier/Label|/logproto.Querier/Series|/logproto.Querier/QuerySample|/logproto.Querier/GetChunkIDs"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-write"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

1-
(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"data-loki-write-.*"})
  /
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"data-loki-write-.*"})
)

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-read", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-read"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-backend", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(loki|enterprise-logs)-backend"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

1-
(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"data-loki-backend-.*"})
  /
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"data-loki-backend-.*"})
)
histogram_quantile(.99, sum(rate(loki_memcache_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (method, name, le, container))
histogram_quantile(.9, sum(rate(loki_memcache_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (method, name, le, container))
histogram_quantile(.5, sum(rate(loki_memcache_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (method, name, le, container))
sum(rate(loki_memcache_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (status_code, method, name, container)
